verses.roman:
ānandita bhakta-gaṇa āsiyā mililā
prema-āliṅgana prabhu sabāre karilā

synonyms: ānandita—very pleased; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; āsiyā—came; mililā—met; prema-āliṅgana—embracing in love; prabhu—the Lord; sabāre—to all devotees; karilā—offered.
translation: All the devotees then came and met the Lord with great happiness. The Lord also embraced each of them in great ecstatic love.
